name: Star Miner (agrugrus)
description:
Made for Juice Jam II, optional theme "pay the price". In 5 days instead of 9 so I couldn't make it quite as juicy as I wanted ^^
Collect stars, don't run out of resources, don't get destroyed by aliens !
